title: indexedDB explorer in dev-tools
body:
It would be nice to see the indexedDB database in dev-tools.
Think about:
* Version
* ObjectStores
* Data in objectstores
* Indexes for objectstores

comments.body: The idea was shared in Oct 2014. Got responded in Oct 2017 still the feature is not available.Please act on it. all developers desperately need it.
I support this idea. Our team have many inconviniences during development without this features.
I support this idea. Please implement.

I'm building an app that uses IndexedDB as a core component right now.  The lack of visibility into the datastore means that I have to develop in another browser by default. I'd vote for this but I'm out of votes.
